body: I checked the code and consulted @agl, and it looks like the only way c.peerCertificates[0] is not part of a verified chain is if you set InsecureSkipVerify in the TLS config. Are you doing that? If not, I think the docs are clear. And if you're setting InsecureSkipVerify, it's not too surprising that VerifyHostname does not do the "verify" part.
